SQL.Index: SELECT * FROM uf_news_notice ORDER BY fbtime DESC
SQL.List: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ORDER BY fbtime DESC) AS rowNo, * FROM uf_news_notice WHERE category = @category
SQL.Detail:
DECLARE @no int
SELECT @no = CONVERT(int, [no]) FROM uf_news_notice WHERE id = @id
SELECT * FROM uf_news_notice WHERE CONVERT(int, [no]) IN (@no + 1, @no, @no - 1) ORDER BY no DESC
